scripts.desc:
# start: Installs and/or updates all dependencies and starts the Node server for spryntax.js
# stop: Stops the Node server for spryntax.js
# restart: Restarts the Node server for spryntax.js
# kill: Stops PM2 (including the Node server for spryntax.js
# status: Gets the status of current PM2 applications
# printout: Shows PM2 printouts from spryntax.
# simple_start: Starts the Express server without PM2.
